name: reco-sphere
description: Reco-Sphere is a full-stack application that provides personalized content recommendations using Spring Boot microservices, a Node.js backend with Apollo GraphQL, and a React-based frontend.

scripts.start: npm run build:frontend && npm-run-all --parallel start:backend start:frontend start:microservice
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run start:backend:dev" "npm run start:frontend:dev" "npm run start:microservice"

author: Mirasol Davila
